TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives a [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Free Technology[COLOR_REVERT] from your current or earlier Era
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]La première civilisation à découvrir ceci reçoit une [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]technologie gratuite[COLOR_REVERT] de l'ère actuelle ou d'une ère passée
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives a [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Free Technology[COLOR_REVERT] from your current or earlier Era
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives a [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Free Technology[COLOR_REVERT] from your current or earlier Era
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives a [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Free Technology[COLOR_REVERT] from your current or earlier Era

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] Free Technologies[COLOR_REVERT] from your current or earlier Era

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%d1_Num Free Technologies[COLOR_REVERT] from your current or earlier Era

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%d1_Num Free Technologies[COLOR_REVERT] from your current or earlier Era

TEXT.Italian: La tua unità è stata schiavizzata!

TEXT.English: An enemy unit has been enslaved!
TEXT.French: Une unité ennemie a été asservie !

TEXT.English: A part of our population from %s1 is emigrating to the New World!
TEXT.French: Une partie de notre population émigre vers le Nouveau Monde !
TEXT.German: Ein Teil unserer Bevölkerung aus %s1 wandert in die Neue Welt aus!
TEXT.Italian: Parte della nostra popolazione emigra in America!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Parte de nuestra población está emigrando a Estados Unidos!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Founded when a Hindu Temple is built
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Fondé quand un temple hindou est construit
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Founded when a Hindu Temple is built
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Founded when a Hindu Temple is built
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Founded when a Hindu Temple is built

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Founded when Christian civilizations control less than half of all Christian cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Alternately founded by the first civilization to build an Orthodox Cathedral without controlling the Orthodox holy city
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Fondé quand les civilisations chrétiennes contrôlent moins de la moitié des villes chrétiennes[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Peut aussi être fondé par la première civilisation qui construit une cathédrale orthodoxe sans contrôler la ville sainte orthodoxe
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Founded when Christian civilizations control less than half of all Christian cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Alternately founded by the first civilization to build an Orthodox Cathedral without controlling the Orthodox holy city
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Founded when Christian civilizations control less than half of all Christian cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Alternately founded by the first civilization to build an Orthodox Cathedral without controlling the Orthodox holy city
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Founded when Christian civilizations control less than half of all Christian cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Alternately founded by the first civilization to build an Orthodox Cathedral without controlling the Orthodox holy city

TEXT.English: %D1_Mod%%: for trading with Defensive Pact partner
TEXT.French: %D1_Mod%%: commerce avec un partenaire de pacte de défense
TEXT.Italian: %D1_Mod%%: for trading with Defensive Pact partner
TEXT.Spanish: %D1_Mod%%: for trading with Defensive Pact partner

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No negative Stability Points for low amount of traded resources
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Pas de points de stabilité négatifs pour un faible niveau de ressources échangées
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Keine Stabilitätspunktabzüge durch eine geringe Anzahl gehandelter Ressourcen
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Nessun punto stabilità negativo in caso di scarso commercio di risorse.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No hay puntos de estabilidad negativos por baja cantidad de recursos intercambiados

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2 additional Stability Points on city conquest
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+2 points de stabilité à la conquête d'une ville
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]+2 punti stabilità addizionali conquistando una città.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]+2 puntos de estabilidad adicionales por conquista de ciudad

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change spécialiste gratuit par ville dans le cœur historique

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad per Military Unit Stationed in a City up to a Maximum of %D3
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad par unité militaire postée dans une ville, jusqu'à concurrence de %D3
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad pro in einer Stadt stationierter Militäreinheit bis zu einem Maximum von %D3
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad per Military Unit Stationed in a City up to a Maximum of %D3
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad per Military Unit Stationed in a City up to a Maximum of %D3

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change[ICON_COMMERCE] in Capital for every Vassal City
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change[ICON_COMMERCE] dans la capitale pour chaque ville vassale
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change[ICON_COMMERCE] in Capital for every Vassal City
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change[ICON_COMMERCE] in Capital for every Vassal City

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]+4 puntos de estabilidad por cada vasallo

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+4 Stability Points for each civilization starting point controlled
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+4 points de stabilité par point de départ de civilisation contrôlé
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]+4 punti stabilità per ogni punto di avvio di civiltà controllato.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]+4 puntos de estabilidad por cada punto de inicio de civilización controlado

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No more than one corporation per city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Post-communist crisis in case of economic system switch
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Pas plus d'une société commerciale par ville[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Crise post-communiste en cas de changement de système économique
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Maximal eine Kapitalgesellschaft pro Stadt[ICON_BULLET][ICON_BULLET]Post-kommunistische Krise im Falle eines Wirtschaftssystemwechsels
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]No more than one corporation per city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Post-communist crisis in case of economic system switch
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No more than one corporation per city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Post-communist crisis in case of economic system switch

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Can convert production to commerce with %D1_Mod%% efficiency
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Can convert production to commerce with %D1_Mod%% efficiency

TEXT.English: [SPACE]per Specialist for every city that works at most %d1 land tiles
TEXT.French: [SPACE]par spécialiste pour chaque ville qui exploite un maximum de %d1 cases terrestres
TEXT.German: [SPACE]pro Spezialist für jede Stadt, die höchstens %d1 Landfelder bearbeitet
TEXT.Italian: [SPACE]per Specialist for every city that works at most %d1 land tiles
TEXT.Spanish: [SPACE]per Specialist for every city that works at most %d1 land tiles

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No Additional Income from Foreign Trade Routes
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Pas de revenu additionnel pour les routes commerciales étrangères
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]No Additional Income from Foreign Trade Routes
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No Additional Income from Foreign Trade Routes

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2 additional Stability Points for each city founded at least 15 tiles from the capital
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+2 points de stabilité par ville fondée à 15 cases ou plus de la capitale
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]+2 zusätzliche Stabilitätspunkte für jede Stadt, die mindestens 15 Geländefelder von der Hauptstadt entfernt gegründet wurde
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]+2 punti stabilità addizionali per ogni città fondata ad almeno 15 caselle dalla capitale.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]+2 puntos de estabilidad adicionales por cada ciudad fundada al menos a 15 casillas de la capital

TEXT.English: Removing a %s1 near your city of %s2 has created %d3 [ICON_GOLD] for your treasury.
TEXT.French: Retirer une forêt %s1 près de votre ville de %s2 a ajouté %d3 [ICON_GOLD] à votre trésor.
TEXT.German: Removing a %s1 near your city of %s2 has created %d3 [ICON_GOLD] for your treasury.
TEXT.Italian: Removing a %s1 near your city of %s2 has created %d3 [ICON_GOLD] for your treasury.
TEXT.Spanish: Removing a %s1 near your city of %s2 has created %d3 [ICON_GOLD] for your treasury.

TEXT.English: We have collected a tithe of %d1 from the Catholic world.
TEXT.French: Nous avons perçu une dîme de %d1 [ICON_GOLD] de la part du monde catholique.
TEXT.German: We have collected a tithe of %d1 from the Catholic world.
TEXT.Italian: We have collected a tithe of %d1 from the Catholic world.
TEXT.Spanish: We have collected a tithe of %d1 from the Catholic world.

TEXT.English: A %s1 embassy has been established in
TEXT.French: Une ambassade %s1:2 a été établie à
TEXT.German: Es wurde eine %s1 Botschaft errichtet, und zwar in
TEXT.Spanish: El imperio %s1 ha abierto una embajada en

TEXT.English: You have escaped and regained control of %s1 territory. Now let's teach our enemies a lesson!
TEXT.French: Vous vous êtes échappé et avez regagné le contrôle du territoire %s1. À présent, donnons une leçon à nos ennemis !
TEXT.German: Ihr seid entkommen und habt die Kontrolle über das %s1:3 Gebiet wiedererlangt. Nun sollten wir unseren Feinden eine Lektion erteilen!
TEXT.Italian: Sei riuscito a fuggire e a riguadagnare il controllo del territorio %s1. Ora diamo una bella lezione ai nostri nemici!
TEXT.Spanish: Habéis escapado y recuperado el control del territorio %s1:1. ¡Démosles una lección a nuestros enemigos!

TEXT.English: You have escaped and regained control of
TEXT.French: Vous vous êtes échappé et avez regagné le contrôle du territoire
TEXT.German: Ihr seid entkommen und habt die Kontrolle über das
TEXT.Italian: Sei riuscito a fuggire e a riguadagnare il controllo del territorio
TEXT.Spanish: Habéis escapado y recuperado el control del territorio

TEXT.English: territory. Now let's teach our enemies a lesson!
TEXT.French: . À présent, donnons une leçon à nos ennemis !
TEXT.German: Territorium wiedererlangt. Nun sollten wir unseren Feinden eine Lektion erteilen!
TEXT.Italian: . Ora diamo una bella lezione ai nostri nemici!

TEXT.English: You have been captured by the %s1:2 and exiled to the unimportant lands of %s2. You have a short period of time for retaking your capital and gain back your position.
TEXT.French: Vous avez été capturé par les %s1 et exilé dans les terres inintéressantes de %s2. Vous avez peu de temps pour reprendre votre capitale et récupérer votre situation.
TEXT.German: Ihr wurdet vom %s1:2 Volk gefangen genommen und seid ins Exil geschickt worden - in das unbedeutende %s2:3 Reich. Es bleibt Euch nur wenig Zeit, um Eure Hauptstadt zurückzuerobern und Eure Position wiederzuerlangen.
TEXT.Italian: Sei stato catturato dai %s1:3 ed esiliato nelle insignificanti terre di %s2. Hai un breve periodo di tempo per riprendere la tua capitale e riguadagnare la tua posizione.
TEXT.Spanish: Habéis sido capturado por los %s1:3 y exiliado a las insignificantes tierras de %s2. Disponéis de un breve periodo de tiempo para recuperar vuestra capital y vuestra posición.

TEXT.English: You have been captured by the
TEXT.French: Vous avez été capturé par les

TEXT.English: and exiled to the unimportant lands of
TEXT.French: et exilé dans les terres inintéressantes de
TEXT.German: gefangen genommen und seid ins Exil geschickt worden - in das unbedeutende Land von
TEXT.Italian: ed esiliato nelle insignificanti terre di
TEXT.Spanish: os ha capturado y exiliado a las insignificantes tierras de

TEXT.English: . You have a short period of time for retaking your capital and gain back your position.
TEXT.French: . Vous avez peu de temps pour reprendre votre capitale et récupérer votre situation.
TEXT.German: . Es bleibt Euch nur wenig Zeit, um Eure Hauptstadt zurückzuerobern und Eure Position wiederzuerlangen.
TEXT.Italian: . Hai un breve periodo di tempo per riprendere la tua capitale e riguadagnare la tua posizione.
TEXT.Spanish: . Disponéis de un breve periodo de tiempo para recuperar vuestra capital y vuestra posición.

TEXT.English: Conquerors from a far away continent are invading our lands searching for wealth!
TEXT.French: Des conquérants venus d'un continent lointain envahissent nos terres à la recherche de richesses !
TEXT.German: Eroberer von einem weit entfernten Kontinent fallen auf der Suche nach Reichtum in unser Land ein!
TEXT.Italian: I conquistatori provenienti da un continente lontano invadono le nostre terre in cerca di ricchezza!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Unos conquistadores de un continente lejano están invadiendo nuestras tierras en busca de riquezas!

TEXT.English: A group of our own adventurers has arrived in the new world searching for wealth!
TEXT.French: Un groupe de nos aventuriers est arrivé dans le Nouveau Monde à la recherche de richesses !
TEXT.German: Eine Gruppe Eurer eigenen Abenteurer ist auf der Suche nach Reichtum in der Neuen Welt angekommen!
TEXT.Italian: Un gruppo di nostri avventurieri è arrivato nel nuovo mondo in cerca di ricchezza!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Uno de nuestros grupos de aventureros ha llegado a unas nuevas tierras en busca de riquezas!

TEXT.French: Nous acceptons de céder le territoire !

TEXT.English: Some of our forces are joining the enemy to help their war of liberation!
TEXT.French: Certaines de nos forces se joignent à l'ennemi pour les aider dans leur guerre de libération !
TEXT.German: Einige unserer Streitkräfte schließen sich dem Feind an, um ihm bei seinem Befreiungskrieg zu helfen!
TEXT.Italian: Alcune delle nostre forze si uniscono al nemico per aiutarne la guerra di liberazione!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Algunas de nuestras unidades se han unido al enemigo para luchar en su guerra de liberación!

TEXT.English: Some of our enemy's forces are joining us to help our war of liberation!
TEXT.French: Certaines des forces ennemies se joignent à nous pour nous aider dans notre guerre de libération !
TEXT.German: Einige feindliche Streitkräfte schließen sich uns an, um uns bei unserem Befreiungskrieg zu helfen!
TEXT.Italian: Alcune forze del nemico si uniscono a noi per aiutarci nella guerra di liberazione!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Algunas de las unidades del enemigo se han unido a nosotros para apoyarnos en nuestra guerra de liberación!

TEXT.English: We refused the flip, this means war!
TEXT.French: Nous refusons de céder le territoire, cela signifie la guerre !
TEXT.German: Wir lassen sie nicht ziehen. Das bedeutet Krieg!
TEXT.Italian: Abbiamo rifiutato il passaggio: ciò significa guerra!
TEXT.Spanish: Nos hemos negado a la cesión, ¡esto significa la guerra!

TEXT.English: Cities in the area have joined our rising empire!
TEXT.French: Certaines villes de la région ont rejoint notre empire florissant !
TEXT.German: Die Städte in der Gegend haben sich unserem aufstrebenden Reich angeschlossen!
TEXT.Italian: Le città di questa regione si sono unite al nostro impero!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Las ciudades de la zona se han unido a nuestro naciente imperio!

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE]want to flip to a rising civilization. Our refusal may lead to a war and some of our troops may join it. Should we let them go?
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE]désirent rejoindre une civilisation émergente. Notre refus pourrait conduire à une guerre et certaines de nos troupes pourraient s'y joindre. Devons-nous les laisser y aller ?
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE]wollen sich einer aufstrebenden Zivilisation anschließen. Wenn wir es ihnen verweigern, hätte das einen Krieg zur Folge und einige unserer Truppen könnten sich dem Feind anschließen. Sollen wir die Städte ziehen lassen?
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE]vogliono passare a una nuova civiltà. Il nostro rifiuto potrebbe portare alla guerra e alcune nostre truppe potrebbero unirsi a loro. Le lasciamo andare?
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE]quieren unirse a la incipiente civilización. Una negativa por nuestra parte podría provocar la guerra y parte de nuestras tropas podrían unirse a ella. ¿Debemos permitir que se unan?

TEXT.English: %D1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "Our specialists increase the prestige of our city!"
TEXT.French: %D1_Change[ICON_HAPPY] : "Nos spécialistes contribuent au prestige de notre ville !"
TEXT.German: %D1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "Unsere Spezialisten steigern das Prestige unserer Stadt!"
TEXT.Italian: %D1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "Our specialists increase the prestige of our city!"
TEXT.Spanish: %D1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "Our specialists increase the prestige of our city!"

TEXT.English: Can Spend Gold to Finish Building Production in a City
TEXT.French: Possibilité de dépenser de l'or pour achever la production des bâtiments
TEXT.German: Can Spend Gold to Finish Building Production in a City
TEXT.Italian: Can Spend Gold to Finish Building Production in a City
TEXT.Spanish: Can Spend Gold to Finish Building Production in a City

TEXT.English: Can Spend Gold to Finish Military Unit Production in a City
TEXT.French: Possibilité de dépenser de l'or pour achever la production des unités militaires
TEXT.German: Can Spend Gold to Finish Military Unit Production in a City
TEXT.Italian: Can Spend Gold to Finish Military Unit Production in a City
TEXT.Spanish: Can Spend Gold to Finish Military Unit Production in a City

TEXT.English: cities have declared independence from their foreign domination!
TEXT.French: ont déclaré leur indépendance par rapport à la domination étrangère !
TEXT.German: Städte haben ihre Unabhängigkeit von der Fremdherrschaft erklärt!
TEXT.Italian: città hanno dichiarato la propria indipendenza dal dominio straniero!
TEXT.Spanish: ciudades han declarado su independencia del dominio extranjero.

TEXT.English: %s1 cities have declared their independence from their foreign domination!
TEXT.French: Les villes %s1 ont déclaré leur indépendance par rapport à la domination étrangère !
TEXT.German: %s1:3 Städte haben ihre Unabhängigkeit von der Fremdherrschaft erklärt!
TEXT.Italian: Le città %s1:4 hanno dichiarato la propria indipendenza dal dominio straniero!
TEXT.Spanish: Las ciudades %s1:4 han declarado su independencia del dominio extranjero.

TEXT.English: The trade passing through our waters brings %d1 [ICON_GOLD] to our treasury!
TEXT.French: Le commerce passant par nos mers contribue à notre trésor à hauteur de %d1 [ICON_GOLD] !
TEXT.German: Der durch unsere Gewässer verlaufende Handel bringt unserer Schatzkammer %d1 [ICON_GOLD]!
TEXT.Italian: The trade passing through our waters brings %d1 [ICON_GOLD] to our treasury!
TEXT.Spanish: The trade passing through our waters brings %d1 [ICON_GOLD] to our treasury!

TEXT.French: Les armées %s1 ont envahi notre territoire !
TEXT.German: %s1 Armeen sind in unser Territorium eingefallen!

TEXT.English: Your Holkan has defeated a %s1 %s2, acquiring %d3 [ICON_FOOD] for %s4.
TEXT.French: Votre holkan a vaincu un %s2 %s1 et ramené %d3 [ICON_FOOD] à %s4.
TEXT.German: Your Holkan has defeated a %s1 %s2, acquiring %d3 [ICON_FOOD] for %s4.
TEXT.Italian: Your Holkan has defeated a %s1 %s2, acquiring %d3 [ICON_FOOD] for %s4.
TEXT.Spanish: Your Holkan has defeated a %s1 %s2, acquiring %d3 [ICON_FOOD] for %s4.

TEXT.English: Nationalism has changed the conception of armies: Mercenaries no longer fit in!
TEXT.French: Le Nationalisme a changé la conception des armées : les mercenaires ne sont plus utilisés !
TEXT.German: Der Nationalismus veränderte das Prinzip des strukturellen Aufbaus einer Armee so grundlegend, dass Söldner nicht mehr in das Konzept passen.
TEXT.Italian: Il nazionalismo ha cambiato la concezione degli eserciti: non c'è più posto per i mercenari!
TEXT.Spanish: El nacionalismo ha cambiado la concepción de los ejércitos: ¡los mercenarios ya no encajan en ellos!

TEXT.French: Informations sur les groupes de mercenaires

TEXT.English: Your persecutor has successfully purged %s2_religion from %s1_city and confiscated %d3_gold[ICON_GOLD] from the victims.
TEXT.French: Votre inquisiteur a réussi à purger la ville de %s1_city du %s2_religion et a confisqué au passage %d3_gold[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.German: Your persecutor has successfully purged %s2_religion from %s1_city and confiscated %d3_gold[ICON_GOLD] from the victims.
TEXT.Italian: Your persecutor has successfully purged %s2_religion from %s1_city and confiscated %d3_gold[ICON_GOLD] from the victims.
TEXT.Spanish: Your persecutor has successfully purged %s2_religion from %s1_city and confiscated %d3_gold[ICON_GOLD] from the victims.

TEXT.English: A %s1 has been born after the construction of La Mezquita in %s2!
TEXT.French: Un %s1 est né à la suite de la construction de La Mezquita à %s2 !
TEXT.German: Ein %s1 wurde nach der Errichtung der La Mezquita in %s2 geboren!
TEXT.Italian: A %s1 has been born after the construction of La Mezquita in %s2!
TEXT.Spanish: A %s1 has been born after the construction of La Mezquita in %s2!

TEXT.German: Die Stadt %s1_CityName wurde an das %s2:2_CivName übereignet!!!

TEXT.English: Our source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] near %s2_CityName has been exhausted!
TEXT.French: Notre source de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] près de %s2_CityName est épuisée !
TEXT.German: Unser Vorkommen des Bonusguts [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] in der Nähe von %s2_CityName ist aufgebraucht!
TEXT.Italian: Our source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] near %s2_CityName has been exhausted!
TEXT.Spanish: Our source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] near %s2_CityName has been exhausted!

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut se propager dans vos villes avec la technologie : [COLOR_TECH_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_TechName[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.German: Die Große Persönlichkeit %s1_GPName wurde nahe %s2_CityName geboren!

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%[ICON_PRODUCTION] pour les bâtiments liés à la religion d'État

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%[ICON_PRODUCTION] for having the current building in your capital
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%[ICON_PRODUCTION] parce que le bâtiment actuel est déjà dans votre capitale
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%[ICON_PRODUCTION] for having the current building in your capital
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%[ICON_PRODUCTION] for having the current building in your capital
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%[ICON_PRODUCTION] for having the current building in your capital

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%[ICON_PRODUCTION] grâce à la Statue de Zeus pour :%s2_unit_or_building

TEXT.German: Für das %s1:3_PlyrAdject Reich beginnt ein Goldenes Zeitalter
Für das %s1:3_PlyrAdject Reich endet das Goldene Zeitalter ...
TEXT.Spanish: Ha terminado la edad de oro %s1:2_PlyrAdject...

TEXT.German: Für das %s1:3_PlyrAdject Reich hat das Goldene Zeitalter begonnen!!!

TEXT.English: Your Spy has reached the status of a Great Spy!
TEXT.French: Votre espion a atteint le statut d'espion illustre !
TEXT.German: Ihr Spion hat den Status eines Großen Spions erreicht!
TEXT.Italian: Your Spy has reached the status of a Great Spy!
TEXT.Spanish: Your Spy has reached the status of a Great Spy!

TEXT.English: The Mongol hordes have invaded %s1_civ_adjective territory!
TEXT.French: Les hordes mongoles ont envahi le territoire %s1_civ_adjective !
TEXT.German: Die mongolischen Horden sind in %s1_civ_adjective Territorium eingefallen!
TEXT.Italian: The Mongol hordes have invaded %s1_civ_adjective territory!
TEXT.Spanish: The Mongol hordes have invaded %s1_civ_adjective territory!

TEXT.English: The Mongol hordes have invaded our territory!
TEXT.French: Les hordes mongoles ont envahi notre territoire !
TEXT.German: Die mongolischen Horden sind in unser Territorium eingefallen!
TEXT.Italian: The Mongol hordes have invaded our territory!
TEXT.Spanish: The Mongol hordes have invaded our territory!

TEXT.English: There are new mercenaries available for hiring.
TEXT.German: There are new mercenaries available for hiring.
TEXT.Italian: There are new mercenaries available for hiring.
TEXT.Spanish: There are new mercenaries available for hiring.

TEXT.English: Do you wish to take permanent control of the %s1 civilization?
TEXT.French: Voulez-vous prendre le contrôle permanent de la civilisation %s1:2 ?
TEXT.German: Wollt Ihr die permanente Kontrolle über das %s1:3 Volk übernehmen?
TEXT.Italian: Vuoi assumere il controllo permanente della civiltà %s1:2?
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Deseas tomar el control permanente de la civilización %s1:2?

TEXT.English: A new civilization is being born
[H1]A new civilization is being born[\H1][NEWLINE]Do you wish to take permanent control of the %s1 civilization?
TEXT.French: [H1]Naissance d'une nouvelle civilisation[\H1][NEWLINE]Voulez-vous prendre le contrôle permanent de la civilisation %s1:2
TEXT.German: [H1]Eine neue Zivilisation entsteht[\H1][NEWLINE]Wollt Ihr die permanente Kontrolle über das %s1:3 Volk übernehmen?
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Nasce una nuova civiltà[\H1][NEWLINE]Vuoi assumere il controllo permanente della civiltà %s1:2?
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Ha nacido una nueva civilización[\H1][NEWLINE]¿Deseas tomar el control permanente de la civilización %s1:2?

TEXT.English: The generous people of %s2_city have donated famine relief to the endangered people of %s4_city. This humanitarian effort has brought the two nations closer together.
TEXT.French: Les généreux citoyens de %s2_city ont donné de la nourriture aux habitants de %s4_city. Cette aide humanitaire a rapproché les deux nations.
TEXT.German: Die großzügigen Bürger von %s2_city haben die Menschen in %s4_city aus der Hungersnot errettet. Dieser Akt der humanitären Hilfe hat die beiden Nationen einander näher gebracht.
TEXT.Italian: La generosa popolazione di %s2_city ha salvato dalla carestia la gente di %s4_city. Questo sforzo umanitario ha avvicinato le due nazioni.
TEXT.Spanish: El generoso pueblo de %s2_city ha enviado ayuda para paliar la hambruna que sufren los afligidos habitantes de %s4_city. Este acto humanitario ha estrechado los lazos entre ambas naciones.

TEXT.English: The generous people of %s2_city have donated massive famine relief to the starving people of %s4_city. This generous humanitarian effort has brought the two nations much closer together.
TEXT.French: Les généreux citoyens de %s2_city sont massivement venus en aide au peuple affamé de %s4_city. Cette aide humanitaire généreuse a considérablement rapproché les deux nations.
TEXT.German: Die großzügige Bevölkerung von %s2_city hat die Bürger von %s4_city durch massive Nahrungsspenden aus der Hungersnot errettet. Dieser selbstlose Akt der humanitären Hilfe hat die beiden Nationen einander näher gebracht.
TEXT.Italian: La generosa popolazione di %s2_city ha decisamente salvato dalla carestia la gente affamata di %s4_city. Questo generoso sforzo umanitario ha avvicinato molto le due nazioni.
TEXT.Spanish: El generoso pueblo de %s2_city ha enviado ayuda ingente para paliar la hambruna que sufren los necesitados habitantes de %s4_city. Este generoso acto humanitario ha estrechado mucho más los lazos entre ambas naciones.

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective investments in horticulture have paid off! A new minor industry is thriving in %s2_city, boosting health and research.
TEXT.French: Les investissements %s1:3_civ_adjective dans le domaine de l'horticulture ont payé ! Une nouvelle industrie mineure prospère à %s2_city, favorisant la santé et la recherche.
TEXT.German: Die %s1:2_civ_adjective Investitionen auf dem Gebiet des Gartenbaus haben sich ausgezahlt! In %s2_city wächst ein neuer Industriezweig heran und steigert die Gesundheit sowie die wissenschaftliche Forschung.
TEXT.Italian: Gli investimenti %s1:3_civ_adjective nell'orticultura stanno dando frutti! A %s2_city prospera una nuova industria minore, che incrementa salute e ricerca.
TEXT.Spanish: Las inversiones %s1:4_civ_adjective en horticultura han valido la pena. Una nueva industria menor está prosperando en %s2_city, lo que impulsa la salud y la investigación.

TEXT.English: You lack a state religion with religious goals!
TEXT.French: Vous n'avez pas de religion d'État possédant des objectifs religieux !
TEXT.German: Euch fehlt eine Staatsreligion mit religiösen Zielen!
TEXT.Italian: You lack a state religion with religious goals!
TEXT.Spanish: You lack a state religion with religious goals!

TEXT.English: The spread of %s1 to our city of %s2 caused its citizens to abandon their Pagan Temple.
TEXT.French: La propagation de la religion : %s1 à %s2 a poussé les citoyens à abandonner leur temple païen.
TEXT.German: The spread of %s1 to our city of %s2 caused its citizens to abandon their Pagan Temple.
TEXT.Italian: The spread of %s1 to our city of %s2 caused its citizens to abandon their Pagan Temple.
TEXT.Spanish: The spread of %s1 to our city of %s2 caused its citizens to abandon their Pagan Temple.

TEXT.English: The spread of %s1 to our city of %s2 caused its citizens to repurpose their Pagan Temple as a %s3.
TEXT.French: La propagation de la religion : %s1 à %s2 a poussé les citoyens à reconvertir leur temple païen en %s3.
TEXT.German: The spread of %s1 to our city of %s2 caused its citizens to repurpose their Pagan Temple as a %s3.
TEXT.Italian: The spread of %s1 to our city of %s2 caused its citizens to repurpose their Pagan Temple as a %s3.
TEXT.Spanish: The spread of %s1 to our city of %s2 caused its citizens to repurpose their Pagan Temple as a %s3.

TEXT.Italian: Which religion do you want to persecute in %s1?
TEXT.Spanish: Which religion do you want to persecute in %s1?

TEXT.Italian: Religious persecution in %s2 has removed %s1 from the city.
TEXT.Spanish: Religious persecution in %s2 has removed %s1 from the city.

TEXT.French: La peste tue des gens dans la ville :
TEXT.Italian: La peste sta uccidendo gente a
TEXT.Spanish: La peste está matando gente en

TEXT.French: La peste a tué notre unité près de

TEXT.Italian: La peste ha ucciso la nostra unità vicino a
TEXT.Spanish: La peste ha matado a una unidad nuestra cerca de

TEXT.German: Die Pest breitet sich aus, diesmal in
TEXT.Italian: La peste si è diffusa a
TEXT.Spanish: La peste se ha extendido por

TEXT.French: Montrer le tour final des VHU

TEXT.English: The turn in which your UHV goals must be completed is displayed even after the discovery of Calendar.
TEXT.French: Les tours auxquels vos objectifs de VHU doivent être accomplis sont montrés même après la découverte du calendrier.
TEXT.German: Die Runde, in der Ihre EHS-Ziele erfüllt werden müssen, wird auch nach der Entdeckung des Kalenders angezeigt.
TEXT.Italian: The turn in which your UHV goals must be completed is displayed even after the discovery of Calendar.
TEXT.Spanish: The turn in which your UHV goals must be completed is displayed even after the discovery of Calendar.

TEXT.German: Den Zehnt eintreiben (Benötigt %d1 von insgesamt %d2 Stimmen)

TEXT.English: UN Resolution - Decolonize %s1_city (%s2_player) (Requires %d3_ReqNum of %d4_TotNum Total Votes)
TEXT.French: Résolution de l'ONU - Décoloniser %s1_city (%s2_player) (nécessite %d3_ReqNum votes sur %d4_TotNum)
TEXT.German: UN Resolution - %s1_city (%s2_player) dekolonisieren (Erfordert %d3_ReqNum on insgesamt %d4_TotNum Stimmen.)
TEXT.Italian: UN Resolution - Decolonize %s1_city (%s2_player) (Requires %d3_ReqNum of %d4_TotNum Total Votes)
TEXT.Spanish: UN Resolution - Decolonize %s1_city (%s2_player) (Requires %d3_ReqNum of %d4_TotNum Total Votes)

TEXT.English: Send Inquisition to %s1 (Requires %d2 of %d3 Total Votes)
TEXT.German: Inquisition nach %s1 entsenden (Benötigt %d2 von insgesamt %d3 Stimmen)
TEXT.Italian: Send Inquisition to %s1 (Requires %d2 of %d3 Total Votes)
TEXT.Spanish: Send Inquisition to %s1 (Requires %d2 of %d3 Total Votes)

TEXT.English: UN Resolution - Free %s1_player from %s2_civ_adjective Control (Requires %d3_ReqNum of %d4_TotNum Total Votes)
TEXT.French: Résolution de l'ONU - Libérer %s1_player du contrôle %s2_civ_adjective (nécessite %d3_ReqNum votes sur %d4_TotNum)
TEXT.German: UN Resolution - %s1_player aus %s2:1_civ_adjective Kontrolle befreien (Erfordert %d3_ReqNum on insgesamt %d4_TotNum Stimmen.)
TEXT.Italian: UN Resolution - Free %s1_player from %s2_civ_adjective Control (Requires %d3_ReqNum of %d4_TotNum Total Votes)
TEXT.Spanish: UN Resolution - Free %s1_player from %s2_civ_adjective Control (Requires %d3_ReqNum of %d4_TotNum Total Votes)

TEXT.English: %s1 cities are about to declare their independence and break away from our civilization. Shall we let them go peacefully?
TEXT.French: %s1 cities are about to declare their independence and break away from our civilization. Shall we let them go peacefully?
TEXT.German: %s1:3 Städte sind kurz davor, ihre Unabhängigkeit von uns zu erklären und sich von unserer Zivilisation zu trennen. Sollen wir sie friedlich gehen lassen?
TEXT.Italian: %s1 cities are about to declare their independence and break away from our civilization. Shall we let them go peacefully?
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 cities are about to declare their independence and break away from our civilization. Shall we let them go peacefully?

TEXT.English: The invention of the Printing Press has unleashed a wave of new doctrines. Protestant churches are opposing the power of the Pope over Christian affairs. Shall we embrace the Reformation? All our Catholic cities and buildings will be converted to the new religion. If we convert now, we will receive a bonus of 500 gold for rapidly taking control of Church assets.
TEXT.French: L'invention de l'imprimerie a permis la diffusion de nouvelles idéologies, et des églises dites protestantes commencent à s'opposer au pouvoir du pape sur la chrétienté. Adhérerons-nous à la Réforme ? Nos villes et bâtiments catholiques se convertiront alors à la nouvelle religion. Si nous nous convertissons maintenant, nous recevrons un bonus de 500 or pour avoir rapidement pris le contrôle des biens de l'Église.
TEXT.German: The invention of the Printing Press has unleashed a wave of new doctrines. Protestant churches are opposing the power of the Pope over Christian affairs. Shall we embrace the Reformation? All our Catholic cities and buildings will be converted to the new religion. If we convert now, we will receive a bonus of 500 gold for rapidly taking control of Church assets.
TEXT.Italian: The invention of the Printing Press has unleashed a wave of new doctrines. Protestant churches are opposing the power of the Pope over Christian affairs. Shall we embrace the Reformation? All our Catholic cities and buildings will be converted to the new religion. If we convert now, we will receive a bonus of 500 gold for rapidly taking control of Church assets.
TEXT.Spanish: The invention of the Printing Press has unleashed a wave of new doctrines. Protestant churches are opposing the power of the Pope over Christian affairs. Shall we embrace the Reformation? All our Catholic cities and buildings will be converted to the new religion. If we convert now, we will receive a bonus of 500 gold for rapidly taking control of Church assets.

TEXT.English: The sun rises on the year %s1_year. The %s2_civ people are ready to settle down and found your first city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]%s3_leader, your people have vested absolute power in you, trusting that you can build a Civilization to stand the test of time!
TEXT.French: Le soleil se lève sur l'an %s1_year. Les %s2_civ sont prêts à s'installer et à fonder votre première ville. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]%s3_leader, votre peuple vous a confié le pouvoir absolu et s'en remet à vous pour bâtir une civilisation qui résistera à l'épreuve du temps !
TEXT.German: Die Sonne erhellt das Jahr %s1_year. Das %s2:3_civ Volk ist bereit, sich niederzulassen und Eure erste Stadt zu gründen. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]%s3_leader, Euer Volk hat Euch absolute Macht verliehen und vertraut darauf, dass Ihr eine Zivilisation errichtet, welche die Zeit überdauern wird!
TEXT.Italian: Il sole sorge nell'anno %s1_year. La popolazione %s2:2_civ è infine pronta a stabilirsi e a fondare la tua prima città. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]%s3_leader, il tuo popolo ti ha conferito potere assoluto, credendo che tu possa sviluppare una civiltà in grado di resistere alle prove del tempo!
TEXT.Spanish: El sol se alza en el año %s1_year. Las gentes del %s2_civ están listas para asentarse y fundar vuestra primera ciudad. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]%s3_leader, vuestro pueblo os ha conferido poder absoluto, confiando en que podáis desarrollar una civilización que supere los retos del tiempo.

TEXT.English: While Christianity has since its existence consisted of various sects, our central government could still uphold Christian Orthodoxy. But with worldly control over the Christian world fracturing, the Patriarch of %s1 has declared himself Pope and claims to be the sole representative of God on Earth. Now a theological schism divides Christianity, and several cities outside of our direct control have joined this new Catholic sect.
TEXT.French: Si le christianisme depuis sa naissance est composé de diverses dénominations, il a néanmoins été possible pour notre gouvernement de faire respecter une certaine orthodoxie. Mais maintenant que le contrôle temporel du monde chrétien se fractionne, le patriarche de %s1 s'est déclaré pape et prétend être le seul représentant de Dieu sur Terre. Un schisme théologique divise la chrétienté, et de nombreuses villes hors de notre contrôle direct ont adhéré à cette nouvelle Église catholique.
TEXT.German: While Christianity has since its existence consisted of various sects, our central government could still uphold Christian Orthodoxy. But with worldly control over the Christian world fracturing, the Patriarch of %s1 has declared himself Pope and claims to be the sole representative of God on Earth. Now a theological schism divides Christianity, and several cities outside of our direct control have joined this new Catholic sect.
TEXT.Italian: While Christianity has since its existence consisted of various sects, our central government could still uphold Christian Orthodoxy. But with worldly control over the Christian world fracturing, the Patriarch of %s1 has declared himself Pope and claims to be the sole representative of God on Earth. Now a theological schism divides Christianity, and several cities outside of our direct control have joined this new Catholic sect.
TEXT.Spanish: While Christianity has since its existence consisted of various sects, our central government could still uphold Christian Orthodoxy. But with worldly control over the Christian world fracturing, the Patriarch of %s1 has declared himself Pope and claims to be the sole representative of God on Earth. Now a theological schism divides Christianity, and several cities outside of our direct control have joined this new Catholic sect.

TEXT.English: A vast army of Seljuk Turks has been spotted moving west across the Iranian Plateau!
TEXT.French: Une immense armée de turcs seldjoukides a été aperçue en train de traverser le plateau iranien vers l'ouest !
TEXT.German: Eine gewaltige Armee von Seldschuk-T�rken wurde dabei gesichtet, sich westw�rts durch das Iranische Plateau zu bewegen!

TEXT.English: A %s1 %s2_UnitName has been intercepted by a %s3 SDI %s4!!!
TEXT.French: A %s1 %s2_UnitName has been intercepted by a %s3 SDI %s4!!!
TEXT.German: Eine %s1 %s2_UnitName wurde von einem %s3 SDI-%s4 abgefangen!!!
TEXT.Italian: A %s1 %s2_UnitName has been intercepted by a %s3 SDI %s4!!!
TEXT.Spanish: A %s1 %s2_UnitName has been intercepted by a %s3 SDI %s4!!!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can join a city only if its number of slaves is less than half its population
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Can join a city only if its number of slaves is less than half its population
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kann einer Stadt nur beitreten, wenn die Anzahl ihrer Sklaven geringer als die Hälfte ihrer Bevölkerung ist
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Can join a city only if its number of slaves is less than half its population
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Can join a city only if its number of slaves is less than half its population

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can join a city only if its number of satellites is less than a fifth of its total specialist slots
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Can join a city only if its number of satellites is less than a fifth of its total specialist slots
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kann einer Stadt nur beitreten, wenn die Anzahl ihrer Satelliten gering als ein Fünftel ihrer Anzahl verfügbarer Spezialisten ist
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Can join a city only if its number of satellites is less than a fifth of its total specialist slots
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Can join a city only if its number of satellites is less than a fifth of its total specialist slots
